meanings.definition: Engaged in a fight or struggle
meanings.sent1: The two knights were battling fiercely in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The battling armies clashed on the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The battling squirrels over the last acorn were quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The battling storm clouds darkened the sky, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The image of the battling wrestlers was etched in his memory.

meanings.sent1: She was battling a cold all week but still went to work.
meanings.sent2: The superhero was battling the villain to save the city.
meanings.sent3: The chef was battling with the stubborn jar lid in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: He felt like he was battling against the current in his life.
meanings.sent5: The young warrior was battling the dragon with all his might.

meanings.definition: Striving to overcome a difficulty or obstacle
meanings.sent1: The battling student was determined to pass the exam.
meanings.sent2: The battling entrepreneur faced many challenges while starting her business.
meanings.sent3: The battling cat tried to catch the elusive laser pointer dot.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was battling a mountain of paperwork at her desk.
meanings.sent5: The battling climber reached the summit against all odds.
